content:
Congratulations to your sister! Visiting a newborn niece or nephew is a wonderful reason to travel.

Since the purpose of the trip was to visit your sister and her new baby, this trip can be categorized as a personal trip. You won't be able to claim any expenses related to this trip as business expenses on your taxes.

Moving on to the San Francisco trip... What was the purpose of your trip to San Francisco? Was it for business or personal reasons?
